fields.summary: Allow general pages with global sidebar only

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Variables; $currentDateLozenge and $documentOwner are hidden.

h3. Customer Impact
* Variable is used as a form to make sure the users fill in the required information when creating the page
** Especially for *List Variable* to force the users input only the data from the given list.

h3. Environment
* The new meeting note editor

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to Global Templates and Blueprints
# Edit the meeting note template

h3. Expected Results
Variables are shown

h3. Actual Results
No $currentDateLozenge and $documentOwner variables
 !screenshot-2.png|thumbnail! 


h3. Notes
If you create a meeting note, it would still populate the data as if the variables are never missing but if you go to the template, you'll see the variables are not there. Editing the template would save the template with no variables. Adding the variables manually would cause the page to include the html tag
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: No variables on the new Meeting Notes editor / Editor V2

fields.description:
h2. Summary
Some page links are loading the contentid=-1 URL. The issue was reported fixed on [CONFCLOUD-58985|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-58985] and [CONFCLOUD-62045|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-62045].

Tested and reproduced with: Ios and Android

h2. How to reproduce
# Click a link on mobile, for example, https://shakiru.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SS.

 
h3. Expected behavior
The page should open

h3. Actual results
 This results in 'That page ID is invalid' error.
 !Screenshot_594.png|thumbnail! 

h2. Workaround
Use the desktop view while on the mobile browser.
fields.summary: Can't open page in mobile browser - Invalid URL (contentID=-1)

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Unable to copy a page when Forcepoint Endpoint Google Chrome extension is enabled

h3. Environment
* Google Chrome with Forcepoint Endpoint Chrome extension enabled

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to a page
# Click on copy

h3. Expected Results
Able to copy

h3. Actual Results
A white screen with a grey loading circle that ever loads

h3.Workaround
Use another browser
fields.summary: Unable to copy a page when Forcepoint Endpoint Google Chrome extension is enabled

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When an instance has Fabric Editor enabled for all pages, navigating to \{{/wiki/spaces/SPACE/pages/createlink }}redirects straight to the OLD editor.
h3. Steps to Reproduce.
 # On any browser load https://<instance>.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/<spacekey>/pages/create
 # Errors thrown on the page:
 !Screen Shot 2018-12-04 at 10.28.09 AM.png|width=241,height=103!
 !image-2018-12-04-10-29-06-900.png|width=263,height=105!
 # Error in Console:

{code:java}
11-26 15:26:58	ERROR	com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.synchrony.api.v1.SynchronyTokenResource	Error generating synchrony token {code}
h3. Expected behaviour

URL to load on the New editor
h3. Actual behaviour

URL loading on the OLD Editor
Unable to publish page or save
fields.summary: Create empty page url throwing 'The connection timed out' error

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Currently, file name between link and actual downloaded file do not match.
This might be confusing for users who download lots of files, and/or are performing several backups for their Confluence cloud instance, as this file is named the same as the Space Exports.

h3. Suggestion
Have the file named *Site_Backup.zip* as indicated in the download URL.
fields.summary: File name matching in Site Exports

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
In the [Attachments Macro|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/attachments-macro-724765160.html], it's possible to display with filtered results.

Dragging and dropping attachments via this macro will not display if the results are filtered

e.g. if results are filtered by label, the dragged attachment will not display, because Confluence isn't automatically adding the label
 
h3. Suggested Solution
Correct documentation so that this is clear in case users think that the attachment upload didn't work.
fields.summary: Clarify that drag & dropped files to Attachments macro displaying filtered results will not add labels to file
Getting org.springframework.orm.hibernate5.HibernateOptimisticLockingFailureException exception when posting pages simultaneously

fields.description:
h2. Summary
When using insert link inside an inline comment recently viewed pages does not appear.

h2. How to reproduce
# Highlight text
# Click comment
# Press cmd + k (mac) or ctrl + k (windows)
# Click Recently viewed pages tab.

 
h3. Expected behavior
Recently viewed pages show

h3. Actual results
Recently viewed pages don't show

h2. Workaround
open a second page, find the recently viewed page, copy the title, paste it in, then copy the link and paste it in as well
fields.summary: When using insert link inside an inline comment recently viewed pages does not appear

fields.description:
Please can you create some default macro for beatiful UI for buttons, tabs and expand. 
Or could be possible to add *Refined Toolkit* for Confluence Server into Cloud version or *Adaptavist Content Formats*? 
These features are very useful toolkit for better work with wikispace and currently is missing in cloud version - some easily create BUTTON with links and with color option or icon. 

[UI Buttons Examples|https://marketplace-cdn.atlassian.com/files/images/04db3be4-dfde-43de-bd03-9ada8df38e15.png]

I found alternative in "Composition Tabs & Page Layout" from ServiceRocket Vendor, but this option is now in preparation. 
[https://marketplace.atlassian.com/apps/245/composition-tabs-page-layout?hosting=cloud&tab=overview]

Thank you for your help. 

Tomas
fields.summary: Add default macro for creating UI Buttons, Tabs, Expand

fields.description:
h3. Summary

While using the date picker inside an *Action* in Confluence's new editor, the same will use human-friendly relative dates (e.g. Today, Tomorrow, Yesterday). However, if the user chooses a day that is ahead of yours (Tomorrow), the date will be displayed as "Today":

!picker.png|thumbnail!

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a new page in Confluence
# Insert a new *Action* (using "/action") and a date with the picker (using "//date picker") inside it, pointing to the next day

h3. Expected Results
It should display the correct date or a date representing the current day.

h3. Actual Results
A different date is displayed. 

h3. Notes
It only happens inside an "Action" item once the picker does not work with human-friendly results while in the editor.

h3.Workaround
No workaround at the moment.
fields.summary: Date Picker shows the wrong date in the new editor

fields.description:
h3. Summary
The Issue Statistics macro (gadget) is currently not listing all fields available.

h3. Environment
* Jira Service Desk
* Confluence Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
* Create some issues on JSD with the Organization field set and a filter to list these issues.
* Head to Confluence and create a page.
* Insert the Issue Statistics macro
* Try to select the Organization field on Statistic Type

h3. Expected Results
The field should be listed

h3. Actual Results
The field Organization is not shown (along with other fields)

h3. Workaround
Currently there is no known workaround for this behavior. A workaround will be added here when available
fields.summary: Issue statistics macro is not listing all fields for Statistic Type

fields.description:
h3. Summary

In Confluence, when the user has a page that is larger than the current sidebar side (due to the number of pages created in the space), by trying to scroll down the sidebar information, the scroll will actually start moving the page once it reaches the bottom.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# In Confluence, make sure to have a page that is larger than the sidebar (you can use the 'loremipsum' macro to add a large number of texts to help)
# Once the page is published, go to the sidebar and scroll down to the bottom

h3. Expected Results

The scrolling should move with the sidebar and not affect on the page.

h3. Actual Results
The page will start to scroll down. 

h3. Notes
* Depending on the size of the sidebar, it will stop scrolling the sidebar in the middle of the hierarchy

h3.Workaround
No workaround found at the moment.
fields.summary: Large pages can be scrolled down from the sidebar

fields.description:
h3. *Summary*

Resized images doesn.t keep the resizing on the new editor

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*
 # Create a blog
 # Resize the images to portrait format
 # Pasting it on new editor resulted in the images to be resized. 

h3. *Expected Results*

The resizing should keep the size for the image when pasting it on new editor

h3. *Actual Results*

Images are resized to landscape on new editor 


h3. *Workaround*
 # If you have source editor, you can manually alter the size for the images.
fields.summary: Resizing on external images doesn't actually resize the image on new editor

fields.description:
We're currently facing a software issue where the users are not able to edit or create pages.

This is being investigated internally by the development team with the highest priority at the moment.

All future updates regarding the bug's resolution will be provided through this report.
fields.summary: Users not able to edit and create pages

fields.description:
h3. Issue Summary
The users invited by the site-admin have an option to invite other users when they log in for the first time.

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Invite any user from Confluence
# When the user will sign up using email invitation, they will see an option to invite other users in the very first window. See the screenshot attached.

h3. Expected Results
Invited users should not see an option to invite other users

h3. Actual Results
The users can see a window to invite other users. See the attached screenshot.
 
h3. Notes
In the site access section of the instance, the customer has already made settings where only the invited users can join.

h3. Workaround
When the invited user sees the screen to invite other users then they can click on continue without entering any email address, this way they will not send an invite to other users.
fields.summary: Disable the option to invite team members on the first login

fields.description:
It would be nice if the [Create from Template Macro|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/create-from-template-macro-724765187.html] allowed users to select the necessary labels to be added to a page template.

 !image-2018-11-28-11-16-04-365.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Ability to choose labels on the Create from Template Macro

fields.description:
In order to automate some processing in confluence it would be very useful if we can get and set space header and footer via api.

Also, there is no reason for the header not to be visible in the Overview page.
fields.summary: Get space header via api.

fields.description:
h3. *Summary*

Attachment compressed on preview mode of the page when using Full Width.

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*
 # Create a blog
 # Attached an image on the blog and select "Full Width"
**  !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail! 
 # Publish and noticed that the picture compressed on preview mode.
**  !screenshot-2.png|thumbnail! 


h3. *Expected Results*

Picture should display on "Full Width"

h3. *Actual Results*

Attachment compressed on preview mode
fields.summary: Attachment compressed when embed on Blog using Full Width

fields.description:
- In an editor type some text including an underscore
- Insert a table on the next line
- Try clicking on the black part of the underscore

This places focus on the table, even though it seems like it should place focus on the text. Not related to the underscore, it's just a clear example of where something that looks it's part of the text gives focus to the table.

This was done on Firefox on macOS High Sierra.
fields.summary: Invisible area around table gets focus on click

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
# On the draft of a new page
# Type "/st"

Expected:
Dropdown narrows to macros with "st" in its name, none or the first in focus, with one occurrence of each macro.

Actual:
There are four "Activity stream"s and the 3rd one is always in focus

Screenshot:
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail! 

Note
* In some cases, the other options of Activity Stream will display some Korean characters on the result.
fields.summary: Activity stream is showing multiple times in Dropdown

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Numbered Columns becomes wide when adjusting the width of the table.
It looks narrow in Edit mode but when published it becomes distorted
 !Screen Shot 2018-11-28 at 10.04.18 AM.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Environment
* hello.atlassian.net

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page
# In edit mode, create a table
# The table settings, add numbered columns
# Adjust the width of the table (any column will do)
# Publish the page

h3. Expected Results
Numbered columns will be narrow as shown in Edit mode

h3. Actual Results
The numbered columns gets wide based on the adjustment of the table width

h3. Notes
It happens when you adjust the width of the columns in the table.

Confluence puts a "colgroup" element at the top of the table which specifies the width of each column. However, when a numbered column is added to a three-column table, there's only three "col" elements, instead of four. The width for the first content column is applied to the numbered column instead.

 !confluence-number-column-width-bug.png|thumbnail! 

h3.Workaround
N/A
fields.summary: Numbered columns become wide based on the adjustment of table width

fields.description:
Currently Gadgets (ie. macros with a "Gadget URL" in the macro browser) trigger fallback mode which has the following bug: [CONFCLOUD-64738|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-64738]

We should determine how common Gadgets are. If they are common in fallback mode, and they are easy to support outside of fallback mode, then we should support them by adding "gadget" to the macro whitelist in macro-asyncsafe-whitelist.properties.
fields.summary: Possibly support Gadgets outside of fallback mode

fields.description:
Currently Roadmap Planner triggers fallback mode which has the following bug: [CONFCLOUD-64738|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-64738]

However we think Roadmap Planner does not need to trigger fallback mode.

We should test whether Roadmap Planner does work outside of fallback mode, and then if so, add "roadmap" to the macro whitelist in macro-asyncsafe-whitelist.properties.
fields.summary: Support Roadmap Planner outside of fallback mode

fields.description:
User are seeing a bad layout issue when opening the attachments view in full screen. Basically the layout does not fix the width of all columns. They get narrower (and the rows subsequently taller) until you can't actually see the filenames at all. Please see attached video.

The table view should be fixed-width and horizontal scrolling should be enabled when the left-side navigation bar is expanded.
fields.summary: Attachment Page Resize Bug

fields.description:
Hi Atlassian - 
I opened https://community.atlassian.com/t5/Confluence-questions/How-to-hide-content-author-name-created-by-in-a-page/qaq-p/943662?utm_source=atlcomm&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=immediate_general_reply&utm_content=topic where I was directed to open a ticket here.

While my request is specific in that question - I would like a lot more control over how Confluence displays my content. This could be through access to stylesheets or better support for theming (or both).

Has this been requested by others?
fields.summary: More control over display of content (stylesheets/themes)

fields.description:
h3. Issue Summary

While accessing the *Spaces/Pages* getting an error "sendUIEvent is not a function" on the left sidebar.
h3. Environment
 * Confluence Cloud
 * Firefox browser
 * Internet Explorer
 * MS Edge

h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Access instances on *Firefox* browser.
 # Click on *Create Page* and the error will be displayed.

h3. Expected Results

It shouldn't be displaying the error stack.
h3. Actual Results

Shows below error:
{code:java}
Something's gone wrong.

Our team has been notified. If the problem persists, please contact Atlassian Support.
Error details:

Error: t.sendUIEvent is not a function.
in t

in e

in e

in n

in e

in div

in div

in t

in div

in GlobalPrimaryActionsItemsWrapper

in div

in GlobalPrimaryActionsInner

in t

in div

in GlobalNavigationPrimaryContainer
{code}
h3. Notes

It happens while creating, moving and editing any content.
h3. Workaround

It works well on *Chrome* browser.
fields.summary: Confluence displays error "sendUIEvent is not a function"

fields.description:
h3. Summary

The JIRA Issue/Filter macro won't display the information contained on the *Development* field of software projects, and also the macro breaks after trying to reorder the issues using this field.
h3. Environment
 * Confluence cloud
 * Jira software

h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # On a Confluence page insert a *JIRA Issue/Filter macro*.
 # Configure a JQL which will return issues with the *Development* field.
 # On the macro's view option, *add* the Development field.
 # *Save* the macro and publish the page.
 # *Reorder* the issues using the Development field.

h3. Expected Results
 * The information contained on the Development field/column should be shown along with the other fields.
 * After reordering the issues on the Development field/column, we should see all the information in the new order.

h3. Actual Results
 * The content of the Development field/column is not shown.
 * After reordering the issues using the Development field we receive an "Internal Server Error":
|!sortError.png|thumbnail!|

h3. Notes

This might be related to the fact that the Development field is an array.
h3. Workaround

Currently, there is no known workaround for this behavior. A workaround will be added here when available.
fields.summary: Development field is not shown on Jira issue macros

fields.description: We want to add an Approver field to the Team Calendar event screen.
fields.summary: Add an Approver Field to the Team Calendar Event Screen

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Loading some files on Confluence experiencing infinitely loading on the preview mode. 

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page and insert a Words, PDF file;
# Insert an Attachment macro

# Click on *view* to view the file from the attachment macro. 

h3. Expected Results

The file should render normally;

h3. Actual Results
After scrolling, an infinite spinner is shown on the file and the current document's page is shown blank.
It may need to reload the page a couple of times to notice the issue. 
 
h3. Notes
* Replicate on testing instance
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail! 

{code}
mediaviewer-2.js:1531 Deprecated API usage: page destroy method, use cleanup() instead{code}
Quite similar with CONFCLOUD-61733

h3.Workaround
Reloading the page will sometimes render the file correctly.
fields.summary: Confluence preview mode keeps loading the file intermitently

fields.description:
When Copy / Pasting a URL of an image in preview mode it truncates the image path.

Current behaviour:
Copy an image URL in preview mode, then paste it into a Confluence page, or inline comment. Notice how (a) becomes (b)

Artefacts:
(a) https://<CLOUDNAME>.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TS/pages/29229471/Testing+image+url?preview=/29229471/29229475/image2018-11-26_16-32-48.png

(b) https://<CLOUDNAME>.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TS/pages/29229471/Testing+image+url

Wanted behaviour:
A direct link to the image is added to the page.

 !image-2018-11-26-16-59-20-495.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Improve how Confluence handles image preview Urls

fields.description:
h3. Steps to reproduce

a) Create a table with date macros in one column and merged cells in a second column, as follows:

 !Screen Shot 2018-11-24 at 18.42.37.png|thumbnail! 

b) Split the merged cell, the result is as follows:

 !Screen Shot 2018-11-24 at 18.42.43.png|thumbnail! 

* cells contain corrupted date macros
* it's very hard to delete this content - at least on macOS as you cannot insert a cursor on the right and click the "delete" button - you have to either try to put empty lines and next delete or you have to remove entire rows.

h3. Expected behaviour

Split cells shall be empty.
fields.summary: Splitting a merged table cell puts a corrupted content inside cells
Ability to disable restricted page from displaying on Jira Issue Links

fields.description:
Hello.

We updated version from 5.8.8 to 6.8.2.

We are noticed that in old version we could expand the sidebar to any width within the screen. In the new version, this has become impossible, there is a maximum width for the space sidebar.



Our users are asking to help them solve this problem, because the long full names of their pages don't displayed in spaces sidebar.



Can we expect this problem to be solved in the next versions? For example, adding a horizontal scroll bar or not limitted resizing for sidebar would solve the problem.



Best regards,
Zhanna
fields.summary: The difficulty of navigating through the sidebar

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Editor is showing strangely due to the custom stylesheet on the space settings.

h3. Environment
* Server to Cloud space import

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# In *Confluence Server*, create a space and apply the CSS from Space Settings.
Example:
{code}
.wiki-content h1 { 
    font-size: 1.6em; 
    font-style:italic; 
    color:#FF0909 !important;
}
{code}
 !confluence_server.jpg|thumbnail! 
# Export the space
# Import the space to Confluence Cloud

h3. Expected Results
The CSS should be purged during the import to Confluence Cloud, as this is not supported in Confluence Cloud.
* [Functional differences in Confluence Cloud|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/functional-differences-in-confluence-cloud-734070955.html]

h3. Actual Results
The custom CSS is carried over to Confluence Cloud.

h3. Notes
* The custom CSS will not be shown when viewing the page
 !viewing_the_page.jpg|thumbnail! 
* The custom CSS will be shown when editing the page
 !Edit_the_Page.jpg|thumbnail! 

h3. Customer impact
* This would cause confusions to users as the View and Edit page are showing different results.

h3.Workaround
# Delete the affected space in Cloud
# Clear the CSS in Server
# Export the space
# Import to Cloud again
fields.summary: Space Custom Stylesheet is Carried Over from Confluence Server

fields.description:
We assume that all Atlassian authors can be matched properly in the Cloud instance. Please check this space [https://ttranminh-gdpr-email.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CSE] as an example.

!Screen Shot 2018-11-23 at 11.18.13 am.png|width=700!
fields.summary: After importing a Space XML exported from a Server instance, all Atlassian authors in the imported space become Unknown Users

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When Slack notification are enabled on a specific space in a Confluence Cloud instance, users are getting notified with below message across all the pages/spaces the instance level.
{quote}
Only visible to you
*Confluence Cloud* [APP]
Looks like you've just shared a Confluence Cloud link. To display previews of pages and blog posts from https://hostname.atlassian.net, link your Confluence Cloud site to your Slack account.
[Link account] [More info]
{quote}

h3. Steps to reproduce
# Connect a Slack channel to a Confluence Space 
# Enable the notifications on that particular space.
# Paste a page link from any other Space in Slack channel
# User will see below alert in Confluence Cloud app in Slack.
 !Slack.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Expected behavior
Slack shouldn't send notifications / recommendation for the pages/spaces which are not configured Slack notifications.

h3. Current behavior
Slack is sending notification to connect  at the instance level to link Confluence Cloud site for all the pages.

h3. Workaround
There is no workaround at the moment instead of disabling the integration at site level.

h3. Recommendation
It'll be good to make notifications configurable at the individual user level to make this app more palatable for users who do not want to receive such prompts.
fields.summary: Slack Notifications - Looks like you've just shared a Confluence Cloud link.

fields.description:
By default, when using Confluence and Jira, there are a couple *gadgets* and the *Jira macro* in order to share and retrieve information directly from one application to another. However, if the user would like to see more information like transitions, comments, or overall actions that will be displayed on the *activity* part of the request, there are no options to have this directly retrieved in Confluence.

Similar to [this suggestion|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32764], this is a request to allow all the activities like comments, transitions, and history to be displayed in a Confluence page.
fields.summary: Ability to display the "Activity" fields from Jira in Confluence

fields.description:
By default, when the users highlight any content while viewing a page in Confluence, the same will provide a pop up with options to add a new "inline comment" or create a new "Jira issue". For some users that do not use it/rely on these functions and only want to highlight specific comment, these features interfere on the usability to do so. 

This is a suggestion to have an option to toggle off the pop-up options. In the Server edition of Confluence, some workarounds like disabling the system "*Page Highlight Actions*" add-on would help.
fields.summary: Ability to disable highlight pop-ups (inline comment and Jira macro) for Confluence

fields.description:
Similar to [this suggestion|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40679] to change the background color of a highlighted text/text with an inline comment, this is a suggestion to change the default color or have it using a color that provides a higher level of contrast so it can be distinct in the page.

While allowing the 'inline comment' highlight color to be changed would also (as the suggestion above) would help, users would still need to perform this modification.

h4.Why this feature?

Users that have vision limitations might not be able to see it properly. Even that some users have options like [inverted colours|https://www.wikihow.com/Invert-Colors-on-a-Mac] for their System, due to the low contrast for the highlighted text, this would still have difficulties to be displayed (instead of yellow x white, which is the default color, it is darker blue x black).
fields.summary: Higher default "Inline Comment" Color Contrast

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Media API's instability causes attachment-related features' (such as PDF export) unavailability.

h3. Steps to Reproduce

There's no specific way to reproduce this case because it happens intermittently up to media server's status.

h3. Expected Results

Attachment-related features work stably.
Set up quota per user or tenant to avoid saturation by requests from a certain account if needed.

h3. Actual Results

MediaApiClient faces Media API's errors such as:

{code:none}
org.apache.http.NoHttpResponseException: api-internal.media.atlassian.com:443 failed to respond at org.apache.http.impl.conn.DefaultHttpResponseParser.parseHead(DefaultHttpResponseParser.java:141)
{code}

TRANSPORT_ERROR occurs 30k times across 1k tenants per day in the recent 3 days.

With that, MediaApiClient gives up retrying operations 5k times a day among 100+ tenants in total.


h3.Workaround

Wait for a while (say 1-2 hours) and try the failed operation again.
fields.summary: A variety of attachment-related features fails due to Media API instability

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When the original page is on new editor, the attachments would be broken when importing the space to a different instance.

h3. Environment
* Cloud to Cloud migration
* Space Import

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a space 
# Create a page with Meeting Notes template (new editor)
# Add some images to the page
# Export the space in XML
# Import the backup to another Confluence Cloud

h3. Expected Results
All attachments are working as shown on the original space

h3. Actual Results
Attachments are broken on the destination instance.

h3. Notes
* This only affects the images. PDF files are working after the import.
* Gallery macro shows the images properly, but the images that used "drap-and-drop" method to upload, are showing "Failed to load"
fields.summary: Space import does not correctly handle images from new editor
Frontend change freeze

fields.description:
*Current:*
When creating a new template in Confluence and using the template, a user is presented with the 'Page Template Wizard':
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail! 

*Improvement:*
Provide an option to disable 'Page Template Wizard' for a template or Include the page template option while creating a page. 

The improvement would ensure similarity to the existing 'Blueprints' templates, they do not display the 'Page Template Wizard'.

One of the feedback from our customer:

{quote}
When we make use of template variables while creating pages, we are first prompted to fill in variables and then it goes to page edit mode, making it 2 step for creating page.
step 1 to fill variables
step 2 edit page

problem with this setup is that, it takes us through 2 steps to create page and once we are on edit page step, we can edit/alter provided variable values as general text content.

when we are in variable filling step, all other details are blocked to edit apart from variable but same is not the case when we are in edit page. it let to alter variable value creating error in reporting at higher level.

can't we just have editing page and filling up of variables on same page? It will be a lot better to provided filling details on same page to avoid going through same page twice for filling in data.{quote}

h3.Note

This would greatly help our customer to save the time need when working with variable
fields.summary: Allow 'Page Template Wizard' display to be configurable

fields.description:
h3.*Summary*

Newly created user for Confluence experienced the following error occurs  _*"Your operation is taking longer than usual"*_

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*
 # Inviting new users to Confluence 

h3. *Expected Results*

User should be able to access Confluence

h3. *Actual Results*

An error message is displayed and users access Confluence
fields.summary: Newly created users via Confluence fail to login with 'Your operation is taking longer than usual' error

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When clicking on the Confluence Logo(https://<instance>.atlassian.net/wiki) in Confluence, it always redirect us to the Activity stream page or recent-work, instead of the Home page.

h3. Steps to Reproduce

# Go to Wiki admin page and select *Further Configuration*
# Set the "Site Homepage" to one of the space
#  Click on the Confluence Logo or go to https://<instance>.atlassian.net/wiki
# Notice that it will redirect the user to  Activity stream page or recent work(https://<instance>.atlassian.net/wiki/discover/all-updates), instead of the Home page.

h3. Expected Results

Be redirected to the Home page.

h3. Actual Results
The user is being redirected to Activity stream page or recent work(https://<instance>.atlassian.net/wiki/discover/all-updates), occasionally it will direct us to the homepage but it's unreliable
fields.summary: Clicking on Confluence logo doesn't redirect to custom landing page

fields.description:
I would either like to see or have the ability to change the way the Event title displays on the calendar. Currently, we are seeing the people who are involved in the event's names before we see the name of the event which makes the calendar messy and hard to read.

It would also be hand to have the ability to hide the people's name from the event title on the calendar altogether, though I understand how this can be helpful for other teams.
fields.summary: Team Calendar display event name before the people who are attending the event

fields.description:
h3. Summary

For specific instances, functions that rely on the indexing are not being updated and displaying inconsistent results. For example:
 * *Macros*: Users that use macros to retrieve pages with labels (like *Content by Label*, *Page Properties* and *Activity Stream*)
 * *Activity feed*: Some updates are not being displayed in the *Activity* feed that comes in the dashboard of Confluence.
 * *Mentions*: Specific users are not being displayed when using the *mention* feature.
 * *Spaces Directory*: Not displaying any spaces or only specific ones.
 * *Page restrictions*: Cannot search or lookup existing users for the restrictions panel. The same is applied for users to be added in Calendar events.

h3. Steps to Reproduce

No specific steps to reproduce, as it affects different parts of the application. When working with a specific instance that presents the behavior, the user will notice one of the symptoms above.
h3. Notes
 * Re-indexing the application will not work without the fix.
 * We have deployed a fix. If support reindex the tenant, the functions that rely on indexing will be back to normal.
 * We have another ticket CONFCLOUD-65206 to fix indexing for those pages with an immense permission field.

h3. Workaround

No workaround at the moment.
fields.summary: Content index not being updated for specific instances

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Users are being presented with a blank page when trying to load a page for the first time
h3. Environment
 * Windows
 * Internet explorer 11

h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Open Confluence
 # Open a page

h3. Expected Results

The page should load normally
h3. Actual Results

A blank screen is shown until the browser is refreshed. After the page loads, the issue repeats for each new page opened:
|!blank_pages.gif|width=900!|

h3.  Notes
- No Splunk errors
- No console errors
- Tested on multiple instances 

h3. Workaround
Reload the page.
fields.summary: Blank pages on IE 11
Page tree is clipped and unable to go deeper

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When searching for contents (pages, files) in the Android mobile app for Confluence the search fails based on the terms (words/letters) used. 

The problem has been identified to be in confluence backend, see comments below for the graphQL query.
h3. Environment

Android Mobile Apps
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Open the app search;
 # Start typing the page/file name;
 # Some results are returned intermittently;
 # Some terms and letters combinations will cause the search to break.

h3. Expected Results
 * The results should be displayed regardless the terms used in the search

h3. Actual Results
 * The search returns a *Something went wrong* error message

h3. Workaround
 * No Workaround at this moment
fields.summary: [Backend] Confluence Mobile App (Android) Search failing based on the searched terms - fix backend api

fields.description:
h3. Summary

While using the Multimedia macro in Internet Explorer, the same will not have an option related to a "Full screen" button:

!multimedia_maco_no_fullscreen_macro.png|thumbnail!

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Make sure to be using Internet Explorer
# In Confluence, make sure to create/edit a page in order to attach a video/reproducible file.
# Insert the [Multimedia macro|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/multimedia-macro-724765227.html]
# Select the video and publish the page

h3. Expected Results

As it happens with the other browser, the macro should have a button to use it in Full-screen mode.

h3. Actual Results

The macro does not render an option for Full-screen.
 
h3. Notes
* This only happens with IE.
* This macro is being deprecated soon, according to the [documentation of the same|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/multimedia-macro-724765227.html]

h3.Workaround
There is no workaround for Internet Explorer.

As an option to help the users, while this is not a workaround inside IE, using a different browser or download the video to use the local media player with full screen might help.
fields.summary: Multimedia macro not working with full-screen in IE

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Changing the theme and language for *Code Macro Administration* from instance admin doesn't work

h3. Environment
* Confluence cloud
* Code Macro Administration

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Navigate to your instance's admin page
# Click *configure code macro* option and change default theme and language to other options.

h3. Expected Results
The *code block* macro should populate those languages.

h3. Actual Results
It doesn't populate
 
h3. Notes
While saving changes gives two notifications 1. Error and 2. Changes saved

h3.Workaround
fields.summary: Changing Code Macro Administration doesn't work

fields.description:
h3. *Summary*

When creating multiple issue using create Jira issue on Confluence. The ticket created with some error on the description.
h3. *Errors on the Jira issue desciption*.
 # Adding more than one images on the user story cell on the requirement table resulted from a broken link on Jira.
 # Formatting on the description doesn't follow the formatting from Confluence

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*
 # Create a product requirement page
 # Bold some text and create with some bullet list
 # Embed some pictures on the User Story cell
 # Highlight the whole content and select" Create multiple issues from table"
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail!
 # Navigate to the ticket from Confluence and notice the 2 issue
 ** Formatting wasn't following the formatting from Confluence
 ** Link to the picture resulted on 400 error page.
 ** !screenshot-2.png|thumbnail!
 ** !screenshot-3.png|thumbnail!

h3. *Expected Results*

The formatting and images should be following the table from Confluence.
h3. *Actual Results*

An error message is displayed and users cannot save/publish the page

h3. *Notes*
* Tested with a Emoticons and found out the same issue as well.

Formattting isn't correct and the links to the image are broken.
h3. *Workaround*
 # Copy the content on a clipboard and paste the content directly on the Jira ticket.
fields.summary: Issue in creating multiple Jira issues from Confluence.

fields.description:
It's quite unlikely that the current configuration is the intended one, especially as the Git tag that is formed for the source releases will ultimately be different to the actual resources used.

This causes corruption of non ASCII strings, as well as invalid interpolation within all resources under /src/etc/java.
fields.summary: When run with release-profile, the resource filtering declaration is overridden.

fields.description:
Hi guys, 

 

I know its the most basic of documents but it would be really nice to have a simple, nice todo list template that people can use in personal spaces. I realise that you probably think this should be handled with tasks from Jira or the rest of confluence with the task list, but sometimes a nice simple to do gets the required job done as well.

 

Cheers
fields.summary: ToDo list template

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When new users access Confluence, they're asked to create a new space if they don't have permissions to view any space. If they don't have global permissions to create a space, they're still presented with the create space onboarding message.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Add a new user
# Remove global permissions to create space for all the groups this user belongs to
# Remove the space permissions on all existing spaces for the user and the groups this user belongs to
# Access Confluence as this user

h3. Expected Results
The user shouldn't be prompted to create a space

h3. Actual Results
The user is prompted to create a space but the space is not created.

h3. Workaround
There's currently no workaround available besides giving permissions on a space or global permission to create spaces.
fields.summary: User asked to create space on the onboarding even without permission
Dynamic Content Macro renders as "unsupported content" in new editor

fields.description:
You are a newly created user for Confluence. You try to access Confluence and the following error occurs  _*"Your operation is taking longer than usual"*_

 

Workaround (please ensure to read the complete steps first and ensure site admin is ready to reinvite): 
 # Go to the User Management page of the user that is impacted via browse to https://<instance>.atlassian.net/admin/users/
 # Delete user by clicking on the down arrow at the "DEACTIVATE" button, then clicking on the option "DELETE" which will delete the user
 # Getting a site admin to reinvite the user , email address , full name and so on must remain the same
fields.summary: Newly created users via Confluence fail to login with 'Your operation is taking longer than usual' error

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Have a Notify REST API to send notification emails just like Jira Cloud's [Send notification for issue|https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/rest/v3/?utm_source=%2Fcloud%2Fjira%2Fplatform%2Frest%2F&utm_medium=302#api-api-3-issue-issueIdOrKey-notify-post].
fields.summary: Notify REST API

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Importing a confluence site import does not seem to cleanup the target site completely.

h3. Steps to Reproduce. 
Seems to happen where customers run into user related errors while running site imports. 
 
h3. Additional Notes
The following errors can be seen in Splunk
{code}
message:	 ERROR: update or delete on table "user_mapping" violates foreign key constraint "fk_content_username" on table "content"
{code}

h3. Workaround
# Arranging with the Customer Advocates to delete the target site and then perform a new site - import. 
# Sign up for a new cloud site and perform a site - import.
fields.summary: Confluence Import does not seem to clean up the existing site during a site import

fields.description: It would be great if there was a Macro just like the [Page Properties Macro|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/page-properties-macro-724765240.html] on a Space level.
fields.summary: Add a Space Properties Macro

fields.description:
h3. Summary

In Confluence, if the user tries to [move a page|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/move-copy-and-hide-pages-724764858.html] to any other space/page, the same will give a parent page as an option and allow the user to *insert* the content. However, if the space that the page will be moved on *does not have a homepage* (overview page), the operation will fail, and the move dialog will display an error message:
{code:java}
The following error(s) occurred:
* Move failed. There was a problem contacting the server. {code}
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Make sure to have a space that does not have a homepage (you can simply *delete* the current homepage to have this result).
 # In a different space, select a page and select the *Move* option from the ellipsis menu on the top-right of the page.
 # Select the target space without a home page in the *Space* field.
 # Fill the *New parent page* field.
 # Click on *Move*.

h3. Expected Results

The operation should work properly and the pages should be moved to the new space.
h3. Actual Results

The page is not moved and the move dialog displays an error message:

!image-2020-09-01-19-29-29-854.png!
h3. Workaround

No workaround at the moment. As it's not recommended to have a space without homepage, make sure to first, configure the homepage prior to the attempt.
fields.summary: Page will not "move" if the target space does not have a homepage

fields.description:
By default, the user can integrate Jira and Confluence from the [Application Links of the instances|https://confluence.atlassian.com/adminjiracloud/using-applinks-to-link-to-other-applications-779295829.html] so gadgets and macros like the [Jira issues one|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/jira-issues-macro-724765217.html] can be used to share the information from Jira requests into Confluence.

Even though both instances are communicating, there is no way to edit the issue directly from Confluence so it would be reflected into Jira's information. This is a suggestion to allow the user to edit the information fro the Jira issue directly from Confluence so it would be reflected in Jira.
fields.summary: Inline editing between Confluence and Jira

fields.description:
*Steps to Reproduce*

# Install a Confluence Connect app using a Macro Input Parameter of type {{username}}.
# Create a macro.
# Request the macro body and parameters via {{GET /wiki/rest/api/content/\{id\}/history/\{version\}/macro/id/\{macroId\}}}, with and without the {{privacyMode}} flag set to {{true}}.

*Expected Results*

If {{privacyMode}} is enabled, the value of the input parameter is one or more account IDs. 

*Actual Results*

Even if {{privacyMode}} is enabled, the value of the input parameter is one or more usernames.
fields.summary: Return account ID for stored macro input parameter of type username

fields.description:
h3. *Summary*

Performance issue while rendering a large table with more than 100 rows.

h3.*Environment*
* Fabric Editor (Confluence new editor)

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*
 # Create a large table with more than 100 rows in new editor
 # Notice that the performance of the table was slow while inserting some text to the table

h3. *Expected Results*

Performance of the table should be stabilized while inserting text on the large table

h3. *Actual Results*

Degraded performance while editing large table.
fields.summary: Slow performance while editing large table

fields.description: It would be useful, when troubleshooting navlink problems, to know who created them and when. This information could be added to the audit log.
fields.summary: Add Application Navigator link events to the Audit Log

fields.description:
It is currently possible to sort the pages at any specific page level in the page tree using the "Reorder Pages" Tool. This is useful, however there are some cases where clients would like to ensure that new pages added to the alphabetically sorted sections remain sorted alphabetically automatically.

I would like to offer the suggestion of allowing persistent alphanumeric sorting as an option when creating new pages.
fields.summary: Allow for persistent sorting of pages

fields.description:
In Confluence, when the user configures the *Root Page* parameter of the [Page Tree macro|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/page-tree-macro-724765260.html] to be '@self' (in order to retrieve a list of child pages under the current one), it will display the message below:

"(!) Page not found"

Indeed, if the user uses this value in a page that actually has a child page, it will display properly. For pages that *do not have* a child page, the same message will be displayed, but, the 'preview' option will only display blank content.

This is a suggestion to improve the message for both scenarios: When you actually have a child page, remove the message or reflect the current page that you are in. When you *don't have a child page*, display a message about not having child pages.
fields.summary: Improve message for Page Tree when using '@self' value

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When using the "Create from template" macro button to create a new page from template, the Breadcrumbs in the editor are one level back from the correct placement in the tree structure. Saving the page will still place the page in the expected position in the tree.

h3. Environment
Confluence Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page with a create from template macro
# use the macro to create a page, and observe the breadcrumbs of the page in the draft.

h3. Expected Results
The breadcrumbs show the new page and the parent page.

h3. Actual Results
The breadcrumbs do not show the parent page or the new page in the breadcrumbs.
 
h3. Notes
Not all instances are impacted.
Trying to change the location will show the wrong location as well.

h3. Workaround
The page will still be placed in the correct location on the tree in spite of the breadcrumbs showing the wrong location.
fields.summary: Breadcrumbs in the editor are incorrect when using Create From Template macro

fields.description:
h3. Summary
It isn't possible to add files larger than 200mb within the attachments macro. 

h3. Steps to reproduce
# Add attachments macro to the page and publish it 
# Upload a file larger than 200mb

h3. Current behavior
A spinning icon will be shown after the file is 100% downloaded, but the file won't show up in the attachment's list

h3. Expected behavior 
The file should be downloaded to the list
fields.summary: File attachments macro isn't attaching files larger than 200mb

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
When using Google Drive macros, Confluence will prompt people to authenticate (with their Google credentials) before they can see the file for the first time and have the option to "Open in Google Drive"

h3. Suggested Solution
Provide an option to "Open in Google Drive" without authentication
fields.summary: Provide an option to Open in Google Drive without authentication

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When choosing Language (Romania, German, Norwegian etc) that has special characters as the default language, the special characters are displayed in strange characters. 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
*  Change your language settings to German

h3. Expected Results
* Special Characters should be displayed correctly

h3. Actual Results
* Special Characters are displaying in strange characters.
fields.summary: Language Special Characters are not Displayed Correctly

fields.description: For multi-lingual companies, who support multi-languages on their site having only one language indexing causes a return of in accurate sear results.
fields.summary: Multi Language indexing

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When clicking on the magnifying glass icon, the search pop-up box quickly appears but it is immediately closed.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Click on the magnifying glass Icon at the sidebar

h3. Expected Results
The search pop-up box should appear.

h3. Actual Results
The search pop-up box quickly appears but is immediately closed.
 [^broken_search.mp4] 

h3. Workaround

It's possible to use the link below to access the Confluence's search functionality:
<YOURINSTANCE>.atlassian.net/wiki/dosearchsite.action
fields.summary: Search function is currently unavailable

fields.description:
h3. *Summary*

When creating new issues within Confluence, using the highlight text feature, the _Link to Epic_ option is not displayed if the Project where the issue is being created is a [team-managed Project|https://confluence.atlassian.com/jirasoftwarecloud/working-with-next-gen-software-projects-945104895.html].

h3.*Environment*
* [Team-managed Projects|https://confluence.atlassian.com/jirasoftwarecloud/working-with-next-gen-software-projects-945104895.html]
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail! 

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*
 # Create a team-managed (formerly next-gen) project and add an Epic and some other issues to it;
 # Create a page on Confluence and add some content to it;
 # Create multiple issues by selecting some text.

h3. *Expected Results*
* It is possible to check the *_Link to Epic_* option.

h3. *Actual Results*
* The *_Link to Epic_* option is not displayed.

h3. *Workaround*
 No Workaround yet.
fields.summary: Link to Epic option is not showing when creating issues within Confluence for team-managed (formerly next-gen) Projects

fields.description: We use Confluence primarily for documentation. We have a requirement to make our document WCAG compliant, which includes the ability to add alt-text to tables.
fields.summary: Add the ability to include alt-text with tables

fields.description:
h3. Summary
We cannot configure the date format for the date picker "//" shortcut in Confluence tables. No matter how Confluence is configured to match a localized date format, the date picker will not change from the DD MM YYYY format.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to *Settings* (cog icon); 
# Go to *General Configuration* and click *Edit*;
# Change the Date Format and choose the format "MMM dd, yyyy";
# *Save* changes;
# Go and add a date to a page using the "//" date picker macro;
# See that the format of the date did not change to match Confluence's localized date format configuration.

h3. Expected Results
We expect the date format to match the localized date format configured in Confluence under the *Settings > General Configuration > Edit > Date Format* (Example of configuration: MMM dd, yyyy and have the macro show that format as well)

h3. Actual Results
The "//" date picker macro will not change formats no matter the date format configured for Confluence.
 
h3. Notes
This date will still reflect the correct date, but not the format.

h3.Workaround
There are different macros available with this functionality
fields.summary: Make the date format for the date picker "//" shortcut configurable

fields.description: 43rwqe5rwqe
fields.summary: dasdar

fields.description:
h3. Summary
cloudId: 3fd06ab5-f71e-48bf-ba7f-09df220c351c
hostname: apagroup.atlassian.net
env=prod-apse2-safe
eventtype=micros_confluence-prod-ap-1

A space with *1,171* pages qualifying the criteria: "_type in (page,blogpost) and space="TBC" order by lastmodified desc, title asc_", the request:
{code:java}
https://<instance_name>.atlassian.net/wiki/rest/api/content/search?type in (page,blogpost) and space="TBC" order by lastmodified desc, title asc&expand=metadata.properties.cw-status,metadata.properties.cwc-page-admin,history.lastUpdated,space&_r=1542009388412
{code}
returns the following number of pages:
 # start=0, limit=100 -> returns 100 pages
 # start=100, limit=100 -> returns 99 pages
 # start=x00, limit-100, where x between 10>= x >=2 -> returns 100 pages

The expected behavior is to return a total of 100 pages for each increment, unless start=1100, limit=100, then the response should return 71

The request for the succeeding search calls came from the {{next}} attribute of the {{/search}} response:
 !Snip20181113_10.png|thumbnail! 

which signifies that there are more pages to see.

The actual request and response is here: [DEVHELP-1900|https://ecosystem.atlassian.net/browse/]
fields.summary: [Backend] /search endpoint does not return the exact number of pages

fields.description:
h3. *Summary*

Cannot create a page using the macro

h3.*Environment*
* Decision template
* Product Requirement
* Retrospective
* File List
* Meeting note

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*
 # Create a page with "Create from Template" macro
 # Clicking on the button to create a page
 # Notice that the create button idle and nothing actually pop out.

h3. *Expected Results*

The page should be created with the desired template

h3. *Actual Results*

Nothing is working when clicking on the create button

h3. *Developer tools logs:*
{code:java}
com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-create-content-plugin:resources.js?externals=__local-default__&locale=en-GB:83 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'itemModuleCompleteKey' of undefined
    at HTMLButtonElement.<anonymous> (com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-create-content-plugin:resources.js?externals=__local-default__&locale=en-GB:83)
    at HTMLButtonElement.dispatch (jquery-min.js:1)
    at HTMLButtonElement.a (jquery-min.js:1)

 {code}

h3. *Workaround*
 # use the "+" button on the sidebar to create the page
fields.summary: Cannot create a page using "Create from Template" macro

fields.description:
Quoted from ADM-196407 on behalf of David Mankin:

It's tough to decide which of the 50 pages on Popular are worth my looking at.

It would be somewhat easier if the page labels were shown. I think there's probably space next to the Date line.

The Space should also be listed. A blog post from the same person in their personal space vs the HR space has different evaluation criteria when choosing what to read.
fields.summary: Feature Request: show page labels on the "Popular Activity" and "All Updates Activity" page

fields.description:
In Confluence Cloud, the only method to reorder pages inside a space would be using the [reorder pages option from the space settings|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/move-copy-and-hide-pages-724764858.html#Move,Copy,andHidePages-Movepages] or, by using the *Move* option from the page operations.

This is a request to provide the users the option to reorder pages using drag and drop directly from the sidebar.
fields.summary: Reorder pages from Sidebar

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Clicking on some links on the page https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/features redirects to 404 error page

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Open https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/features
# Click on the Icon *Learn More* on Team Calenders or Question for Confluence

h3. Expected Results
The link should open a well working page.

h3. Actual Results
Link opens a page with error 404.
 
h3. Notes
NA

h3. Workaround

Currently, there is no known workaround for this behavior.
fields.summary: Dead links on the page https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/features

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Unable to view PSD type file and seeing the following error:

!e.png|thumbnail!

h3. Steps to replicate
 # Upload a PSD file to confluence page
 # Click view

h3. Observed Behavior

Seeing the following error
 !e.png|thumbnail! 


h3. Expected Behavior

The user should be able to view the file
fields.summary: PSD files cannot be view

fields.description:
h2. Summary
A user is attempting to add the following URL as a Space Shortcut with more than 255 characters

After adding the URL and clicking the insert button, the window disappears but the link is not posted. No error message or warning appears.  I am submitting this as a bug since if this is expected behavior, there is no warning or error when the expected outcome is not reached. 

h2. Steps to Reproduce
# Access the Space
# Under the section labeled ‘Space Shortcuts,’ select ‘add link’
# In the ‘Insert Link’ window, select ‘Web Link’ from the left-hand menu
# Paste the attached URL in the Address field and select the ‘Insert’ button
# The link will not appear on the left-hand side under ‘Space Shortcuts’


h2. Expected Result
We would expect to see the shortcut URL on the left-hand side of the Space under the ‘Space Shortcuts’ section.  

h2. Actual Result
If the length of the shortcut exceeds 255 characters, the window closes after selecting ‘Insert,’ but nothing appears on the left-hand menu under ‘Space Shortcuts.’
fields.summary: No error message when adding a Space Shortcut with link longer than 255 characters

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Getting *Invalid OAuth signature* while linking Jira instance to Confluence. 

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud
* OAuth
* Jira Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create an application link with Jira to Confluence
# The Jira endpoint will show it as connected
# The confluence endpoint will throw an error

h3. Expected Results
It should connect through 

h3. Actual Results
Attaching the error screenshot
 !Screen Shot 2018-11-12 at 2.45.08 PM.png|thumbnail! 
 
h3. Notes
It happens while linking Jira Cloud and Confluence cloud. It is only replicated while adding multiple instances link and doesn't affect to instances under the same cloud URL.
fields.summary: Getting "Invalid OAuth signature" while linking Jira instance to Confluence

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When creating a meeting note page and pasting task list from another meeting notes page into it, it results in an error when publishing.  Error: Unable to communicate to the server. Saving is not possible at the moment.
Also, it is because task nodes do not contain state attribute as we have an error in dev console: Task Node must contain state attribute

h3. Environment
*  Confluence Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a new page with meeting notes template.
# Copy the task lists from another meeting notes page and paste them on the newly created meeting notes page. Submit the page, you will see the error. 
It is actually not reproducible, above are the steps performed by the customer. It is because of the new editor.
(i) Note: There is something in the task lists which is causing this problem. 

h3. Expected Results
The page should get published without any error.

h3. Actual Results
The below error comes when publishing the page:
{noformat}
Unable to communicate to the server. Saving is not possible at the moment.
{noformat}
 
h3. Notes
In the developer console, you might see this:
{code}
{statusCode: 500, data: {authorized: false, valid: true, errors: [], successful: false},...}
data: {authorized: false, valid: true, errors: [], successful: false}
authorized: false
errors: []
successful: false
valid: true
message: "com.atlassian.confluence.api.service.exceptions.ServiceException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Task Node must contain state attribute"
statusCode: 500
{code}

h3. Workaround
NA
fields.summary: Error when publishing a meeting notes page: Unable to communicate to the server. Saving is not possible at the moment.

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Balsamiq Wireframes for Confluence Cloud add-on reports sporadic failures when trying to upload a binary file to Confluence Cloud.

The REST calls are made by our server:
{{/rest/api/content/\{contentID\}/child/attachment/\{attachmentID\}/data}}

h3. Steps to Reproduce
* No consistent way to replicate yet. So far, the pattern when this occurs is in the {{Notes}} section.

h3. Expected Results
Successful attachment upload

h3. Actual Results
HTTP status 500

h3. Notes
* Checking the logs, there are two POST {{/rest/api/content/\{contentID\}/child/attachment/\{attachmentID\}/data}} calls that happend at the same time; one fails with a status 500 while the other succeeds
* Intermittently happening so far and cannot find a consistent way to replicate the issue. Probable timing issue, maybe.
fields.summary: Intermittent status 500 for consecutive "Update attachment data" REST API

fields.description:
h3. Summary
For an administrator on Server, this returns all pages including those that have a page view restriction, not including the administrator. This is the correct behavior as administrators need access to all pages even though they may not be able to see them in the UI without adjusting the permissions.

For an administrator on Cloud, this returns only pages that have no view restrictions or ones that they are included in the view permission settings.

Is this a bug or something intentional? Why would Cloud need to be different? The request is for the two to be consistent.
fields.summary: Make Server and Cloud behavior the same for rest/api/latest/content?spaceKey=XXX REST API

fields.description:
In Confluence, when working with the [Jira issues macro|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/jira-issues-macro-724765217.html], the user has the option to either add a *single issue* or a table including *multiple issues*. In this case, it would be helpful if the user could create bulk single issues to be displayed on a page.

Basically, a method to specify a filter, and have all the issues appear as individual JIRA issues on that Confluence page. Example case:

# Open the Insert JIRA Issue/Filter macro
# Use filters to define a list of JIRA issues
# Click Display options
# Select "Single issue"
# Click Insert

This way, the issues would be displayed in Confluence's page, one after the other.
fields.summary: Allow selection of "Display as: Single issue" to insert multiple JIRA issues onto a Confluence page

fields.description:
h3. Summary
If you created a space, you will be automatically watching the Overview of the page. When you unwatched the Overview page, you will still receive Direct notification.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# User 1 creates a space (TEST)
# User 1 unwatched the Overview page and the space (TEST)
# User 2 updated the Overview page of space (TEST)

h3. Expected Results
* The space creator should not receive Direct notification from unwatched overview page of the space.

h3. Actual Results
* The space creator is getting Direct notification from unwatched overview page.
fields.summary: Getting Direct Notification from the unwatched Overview page

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When trying to view a page with JIRA Chart Macro, the macro shows "JIRA Charts are not available for your version of JIRA. Upgrade to JIRA 6.1.1 or later to use this macro.".

h3. Environment
*Confluence Cloud

*Application logs*

h3. Notes
* Only happens on JIRA Chart Macro
* JIRA Issue macros work fine
* The issue happens intermittently

h3.Workaround
Contact Atlassian support in order to work internally on refreshing the content for the Chart macro connection between Jira and Confluence.
fields.summary: JIRA Charts are not available for your version of JIRA. Upgrade to JIRA 6.1.1 or later to use this macro

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
Confluence sends emails whenever a member of the team changes a page, with the changes highlighted in red for changes and green for replacement text. The shades of red/green that the Confluence has means that Color Blind people cannot see the highlight (being red/green color blind). 

h3. Suggested Solution
Configure Confluence to use different shades of red/green or change to other colors so that Color blind people can have a better view.

h3. Why this is important
Color blind people can not see the highlighted change and replacement of content. So, it is important to have other shades of red/green or change to other colors.
 
h3. Workaround 
NA
fields.summary: Configure Confluence to use different shades of red/green or change to other colors for Color Blind people

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition

In [the new editor|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/confluence-editing-improvements-945107733.html#ConfluenceEditingImprovements-blogposts], "Files & images" pops up browser's file selector to upload new attachments. Hence, once user removed a thumbnail from the editor, there's no way to insert
the file other than uploading the same file again.

 !Screenshot 2018-11-09 16.58.34.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Suggested Solution

Provide a way to select a file from previously uploaded attachments.

h3. Workaround

None.
fields.summary: An ability for new editor users to insert a file from existing attachments

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
Currently, only text is affected by line breaks inside a section. Macros are not affected.
As can be seen below, on edit mode the macro is at the center of the section, but on the  published page it's at the top of the section. Texts behave differently:
- Editing:
 !editing.png|thumbnail! 

- Published:
 !published.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Suggested Solution
Allow the macro to be moved down by the line breaks as it happens with texts.

h3. Workaround
Use a table to align the Macro.
fields.summary: Allow line breaks for macros inside Sections

fields.description:
h3. Summary
With the recent [improvement editings for Confluence|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/confluence-editing-improvements-945107733.html], if the user tries to use tripe click (full-text selection) for a text inside a table while editing the page, the selection will highlight the whole table cell, which is expected. However, after unselecting the table and trying to select any part of the text in that cell, the selection will become invisible.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a new page that will contain a table and put some text inside it
# In firefox, edit this page and use a triple-click to select the whole line/sentence. This will trigger a selection of the whole cell.
# Tap the cell (so the selection will be gone) and try to select the text again.

h3. Expected Results
Confluence should allow the text to be selected.
h3. Actual Results
The selection is not displayed. It becomes invisible. To test it, if the same editor is opened in Chrome and Firefox, the same can be seen in Chrome, while in Firefox, it's invisible. 
h3. Notes
* Attached a video of the issue, including the comparison with two browsers open.

h3.Workaround
* Tap the cell one more time and select the text again.
* Use a different browser
fields.summary: Full-text selection becomes invisible on normal text in a table in Firefox

fields.description:
h3. Summary
With log post macro, when using "*" or "@all" to filter content to all spaces in the site. It's only displaying blogs from the current year. 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# You should have a blog from the previous year (2017) in Space 1, label the blog with TEST
# Create a new blog in Space 2, label the blog with TEST
# Create a blog post macro on another page, filter it with 
label: TEST
Restrict to these Spaces: * or @all

h3. Expected Results
* It should display all the blog post created in all spaces with the same label

h3. Actual Results
* Restricting blog post macro to all spaces is only displaying blogs from the current year
fields.summary: Restricting blog post macro to all spaces is only displaying blogs from the current year

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
Customers who have the Attachment Macro on a page to show their Attachments, cannot preview the Attachments by clicking on the links shown.  When the link is clicked, they are prompted to download the file

h3. Suggested Solution
Customers should be able to preview the file when they click on the filename/link.

h3. Why this is important
Customers don't want to consume time by clicking on the arrow and then preview it, they want to preview it by clicking on the filename.

h3. Workaround 
NA
fields.summary: Attachment Macro Does Not Generate Preview When Attachment is Clicked

fields.description:
h3. *Summary*

Using a "Create from template" in creating pages, the title doesn't get populated on the new page. 

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*
# As an administrator of the instance, or, a space, create a custom template to be used by the macro.
# Embed a "create from template" macro on a page.
# On preview or in the published mode, click on the macro to create a new page.
 (i) Note that the title configured on the macro does not populate on the newly created page


h3. *Expected Results*

The page is created with the correct title configured on the macro.

h3. *Actual Results*

The page is created with no title.

h3. *Notes*
* As an important note, this only happens for custom templates. Default templates respect the title value and also the configuration of parameters like "@currentDate".
* This affect both Legacy and Fabric editors.

h3. *Workaround*
Insert the title manually
fields.summary: "Create from Template macro" ignoring title configured on the macro
